spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is recognizable, but significant door and window placement errors exist. External balcony/patio areas are missing. Interior door swings and wall alignment in the master bath area deviate from the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Roof is removed and background is neutral. Major deduction for missing external structures (balconies/patio) which are part of the original footprint. The arched entrance is an architectural hallucination not present in 2D.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture represents the correct blocky low-poly style. However, placement is inconsistent with the plan; for example, the kitchen island is missing, and living room seating is rearranged/simplified.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Excellent adherence to aesthetic requirements. Perfect low-poly, flat-shaded style with soft lighting and a correct isometric orthographic camera angle.

detected_errors.description: Missing outdoor patio (left) and balconies (bottom and right).
Kitchen layout significantly simplified; missing center island and breakfast bar seating.
Hallucinated arched entryways and window shapes not specified in the architectural plan.
Window positions along the bottom wall do not align with the original floor plan spacing.
